Class Citizen

java.lang.Object
Citizen
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContactTracer, GovernmentOfficial
public class Citizen
extends java.lang.Object
This is the Citizen Class for the Corona Tracker Program
Author:
Vincent Ilagan, Ralph Sanson SECTION: S15A

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Citizen​(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String pass)
    Initializes the newly created Citizen with the username and password of the Citizen as its login credentials.

  • Method Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Citizen

      public Citizen​(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String pass)
      Initializes the newly created Citizen with the username and password of the Citizen as its login credentials.
      Parameters:
      user - - the username of the account.
      pass - - the password of the account.

  • Method Details

    • checkIn

      public boolean checkIn​(java.lang.String code, java.time.LocalDate date, java.time.LocalTime time)
      Allows the user to check in to an establishment by entering its establishment code, the date, and time.
      Parameters:
      code - - the establishment code.
      date - - the date entry.
      time - - the time entry.
      Returns:
      returns true if the the code-time-date combination is unique, false if otherwise.

    • declarePositive

      public void declarePositive()
      Declares the user to be positive.

    • setExposed

      public void setExposed()
      Sets the user to be exposed. It is used for contact tracing features used by Contact Tracers.

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword​(java.lang.String password)
      Allows the changing of password for the account.
      Parameters:
      password - - the new password.

    • setPersonalDetails

      public void setPersonalDetails​(PersonalDetails details)
      Assigns a new PersonalDetails object to the account.
      Parameters:
      details - - the new PersonalDetails object.

    • getRecords

      public java.util.ArrayList<Record> getRecords()
      Retrieves the Visit records that contains the establishment code, date, and time/
      Returns:
      - the ArrayList of Records made by the Citizen.

    • getUsername

      public java.lang.String getUsername()
      Retrieves the username.
      Returns:
      - the username of the account.

    • getPassword

      public java.lang.String getPassword()
      Retrieves the password.
      Returns:
      - the password of the account.

    • getIsExposed

      public boolean getIsExposed()
      Returns if the Citizen account has been exposed based past Visit records.
      Returns:
      - returns true if the Citizen might have been exposed, false if otherwise..

    • getIsPositive

      public boolean getIsPositive()
      Returns if the Citizen has declared themselves as positive.
      Returns:
      - returns true if the Citizen has been tested to be positive, false if otherwise.

    • getDetails

      public PersonalDetails getDetails()
      Returns the PersonalDetails of the account.
      Returns:
      - returns the PersonalDetails of the account to be used for editing.

    • displayDetails

      public void displayDetails()
      Deprecated.
      Displays the PersonalDetails of the account along with the username.
